title: How to Clean Japanese Lacquerware

steps.headline: Hand wash with warm water and a soft cloth or sponge after each use.
Remove any dirt with a cloth soaked in warm water.
steps.description: If the item has grease that cannot be removed with warm water alone, you can use a  mild liquid, diluted detergent. Hand wash gently.

steps.headline: Hand dry after draining with a soft towel.

text: Hand wash with warm water and a soft cloth or sponge after each use.  Remove any dirt with a cloth soaked in warm water. If the item has grease that cannot be removed with warm water alone, you can use a  mild liquid, diluted detergent. Hand wash gently. Drain face down.  Hand dry after draining with a soft towel.
